ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD plays Scrooge to this year's stupidest holiday movies, and provides a horrifying look at the hottest Halloween costumes! MAD also investigates the crimes of CSI: NY, and, just in time for TV's November ratings sweeps, provides the All-Inclusive Do-It-Yourself Reality Show Press Release!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:07:50. [Issue ID 129293]
